<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\BusinessProcessProcess;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessCore;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessContent;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessContentVersion;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessActivity;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;
use Inertia\Inertia;
use Inertia\Response;
use Illuminate\Http\RedirectResponse;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Auth\Access\AuthorizesRequests;

class CoreProcessController extends Controller
{
    use AuthorizesRequests;

    /**
     * Show the core process with tabs
     */
    public function show(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        // Load relationships
        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with(['blueprint', 'category']);
            },
            'contents.versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc');
            }
        ]);

        // Get content for each type with ALL their versions (like SOP)
        // Use fresh() to reload from database and get updated status values
        $sopContent = $core->contents()->where('type', 'sop')->first();
        if ($sopContent) {
            // Refresh the sopContent to ensure we have the latest data
            $sopContent = $sopContent->fresh(['versions.creator', 'versions.updater']);
            
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $sopContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $sopContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $sopContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                // Add the display version's content to the sopContent object
                $sopContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $sopContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $sopContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $sopContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $sopContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $sopContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $sopContent->allVersions = $allVersions; // Add sorted versions
            }
        }

        $visualContent = $core->contents()->where('type', 'visual_diagram')->first();
        if ($visualContent) {
            // Refresh the visualContent to ensure we have the latest data
            $visualContent = $visualContent->fresh(['versions.creator', 'versions.updater']);
            
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $visualContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $visualContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $visualContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                $visualContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $visualContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $visualContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $visualContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $visualContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $visualContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $visualContent->allVersions = $allVersions;
            }
        }

        $swimlaneContent = $core->contents->where('type', 'swimlane')->first();
        if ($swimlaneContent) {
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $swimlaneContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $swimlaneContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $swimlaneContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                $swimlaneContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $swimlaneContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $swimlaneContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $swimlaneContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $swimlaneContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $swimlaneContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $swimlaneContent->allVersions = $allVersions;
            }
        }

        // Prepare versions arrays
        $sopVersions = $sopContent?->allVersions ?? [];
        $visualVersions = $visualContent?->allVersions ?? [];
        $swimlaneVersions = $swimlaneContent?->allVersions ?? [];

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/show', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
            'sopContent' => $sopContent,
            'sopVersions' => $sopVersions,
            'visualContent' => $visualContent,
            'visualVersions' => $visualVersions,
            'swimlaneContent' => $swimlaneContent,
            'swimlaneVersions' => $swimlaneVersions,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show SOP tab content
     */
    public function showSop(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $sopContent = $core->sopContent();

        if ($sopContent) {
            $sopContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/sop', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $sopContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show RACI tab content
     */
    public function showRaci(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with('blueprint');
            }
        ]);

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/raci', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show Visual Diagram tab content
     */
    public function showVisual(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $visualContent = $core->visualContent();

        if ($visualContent) {
            $visualContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/visual', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $visualContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show Swimlane tab content
     */
    public function showSwimlane(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $swimlaneContent = $core->swimlaneContent();

        if ($swimlaneContent) {
            $swimlaneContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/swimlane', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $swimlaneContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Update content for SOP, Visual, or Swimlane
     */
    public function updateContent(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, string $type): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Validate content type
        if (!in_array($type, ['sop', 'visual_diagram', 'swimlane'])) {
            abort(400, 'Invalid content type');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'content' => 'required|string',
            'change_summary' => 'nullable|string',
            'metadata' => 'nullable|array',
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $type, $validated) {
            // Get or create content record
            $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $type)->first();

            if (!$content) {
                $content = $core->contents()->create([
                    'type' => $type,
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            } else {
                $content->update([
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            }

            // Create new version
            $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
            $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                (float)$latestVersion->version_number + 0.1 :
                1.0;

            $content->versions()->create([
                'content' => $validated['content'],
                'version_number' => number_format($nextVersionNumber, 1),
                'status' => 1, // 1 = current
                'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'] ?? 'Content updated',
                'metadata' => $validated['metadata'] ?? [],
                'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);

            // Mark previous versions as archived
            $content->versions()
                ->where('version_number', '!=', number_format($nextVersionNumber, 1))
                ->update(['status' => 2]); // 2 = archived
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', ucfirst($type) . ' content updated successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Store new content (SOP, Visual, or Swimlane)
     */
    public function storeContent(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        try {
            // Log incoming request data
            Log::info('storeContent - Incoming request', [
                'all_data' => $request->all(),
                'content_length' => strlen($request->get('content', '')),
                'content_preview' => substr($request->get('content', ''), 0, 100),
            ]);

            $validated = $request->validate([
                'content_type' => 'required|string|in:sop,visual_diagram,swimlane',
                'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
                'content' => 'required|string|min:1', // Content is required and must not be empty
                'change_summary' => 'nullable|string',
                'version_label' => 'nullable|string|max:50',
                'metadata' => 'nullable|array',
                'core_id' => 'nullable|integer', // Frontend sends this but we don't need it since we have $core
            ]);

            Log::info('storeContent - Validation passed', [
                'validated_content_length' => strlen($validated['content']),
                'validated_content_preview' => substr($validated['content'], 0, 100),
            ]);

            DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
                Log::info('storeContent - Starting transaction');

                // Get or create content record using the relationship
                $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $validated['content_type'])->first();
                Log::info('storeContent - Content lookup', ['found_existing' => !!$content]);

                if (!$content) {
                    $content = $core->contents()->create([
                        'type' => $validated['content_type'],
                        'title' => $validated['title'],
                        'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                    ]);
                    Log::info('storeContent - Created new content', ['content_id' => $content->id]);
                } else {
                    $content->update([
                        'title' => $validated['title'],
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                    ]);
                    Log::info('storeContent - Updated existing content', ['content_id' => $content->id]);
                }

                // Determine next version number as string
                $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
                $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                    ((float)$latestVersion->version_number + 1.0) :
                    1.0;

                Log::info('storeContent - Creating version', [
                    'latest_version' => $latestVersion?->version_number,
                    'next_version' => $nextVersionNumber
                ]);

                $newVersion = $content->versions()->create([
                    'content' => $validated['content'] ?? '', // Handle null content
                    'version_number' => (string)$nextVersionNumber,
                    'status' => 'draft', // Use string status
                    'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'] ?? 'New content created',
                    'metadata' => $validated['metadata'] ?? [],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);

                Log::info('storeContent - Created version successfully', ['version_id' => $newVersion->id]);
                Log::info('storeContent - Transaction completed successfully');
            });

            return redirect()->back()->with('success', ucfirst($validated['content_type']) . ' content created successfully.');
        } catch (\Illuminate\Validation\ValidationException $e) {
            Log::error('Validation failed in storeContent', ['errors' => $e->errors(), 'request' => $request->all()]);
            return redirect()->back()->withErrors($e->errors())->withInput();
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            Log::error('Error in storeContent', ['error' => $e->getMessage(), 'request' => $request->all()]);
            return redirect()->back()->with('error', 'Failed to save content: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    /**
     * Save changes to a specific version (like SOP saveVersion)
     */
    public function saveVersion(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'content' => 'sometimes|required|string',
            'title' => 'sometimes|string|max:255',
        ]);

        Log::info('saveVersion - Updating existing version', [
            'content_id' => $content->id,
            'version_id' => $version->id,
            'content_length' => strlen($validated['content'] ?? ''),
        ]);

        // Update the specific version (working copy)
        $updateData = [
            'content' => $validated['content'] ?? $version->content,
            'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
        ];

        $version->update($updateData);

        // Update content metadata if title provided
        if (isset($validated['title'])) {
            $content->update([
                'title' => $validated['title'],
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);
        }

        return back()->with('success', 'Version saved successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Commit the current working copy as a new version (like SOP commit)
     */
    public function commit(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'content_type' => 'required|string|in:sop,visual_diagram,swimlane',
            'content' => 'required|string',
            'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'change_summary' => 'required|string',
        ]);

        Log::info('commit - Creating new version', [
            'core_id' => $core->id,
            'content_type' => $validated['content_type'],
            'content_length' => strlen($validated['content']),
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
            // Get or create content record
            $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $validated['content_type'])->first();

            if (!$content) {
                $content = $core->contents()->create([
                    'type' => $validated['content_type'],
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            } else {
                $content->update([
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            }

            // Get next version number
            $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
            $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                ((float)$latestVersion->version_number + 1.0) :
                1.0;

            // Create new version
            $content->versions()->create([
                'content' => $validated['content'],
                'version_number' => (string)$nextVersionNumber,
                'status' => 0, // New versions start as draft (0 = draft, 1 = current, 2 = future)
                'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'],
                'metadata' => [],
                'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);

            Log::info('commit - New version created successfully', [
                'content_id' => $content->id,
                'version_number' => $nextVersionNumber,
            ]);
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', 'New version created successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Show a specific version of content (like SOP showVersion)
     */
    public function showVersion(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        // Load relationships
        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with('blueprint');
            }
        ]);

        $version->load(['creator']);

        // Get sorted versions like SOP
        $allVersions = $content->getSortedVersions();

        // Convert string statuses to integers for frontend compatibility
        $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($v) {
            $statusMap = ['draft' => 0, 'current' => 1, 'archived' => 2];
            $v->status = $statusMap[$v->status] ?? 0;
            return $v;
        });

        // Convert version status to integer
        $statusMap = ['draft' => 0, 'current' => 1, 'archived' => 2];
        $version->status = $statusMap[$version->status] ?? 0;

        // Prepare content data with specific version
        $contentData = $content->toArray();
        $contentData['content'] = $version->content;
        $contentData['version_number'] = $version->version_number;
        $contentData['change_summary'] = $version->change_summary;
        $contentData['status'] = $version->status;
        $contentData['currentVersion'] = $version; // Current viewing version
        $contentData['allVersions'] = $allVersions; // All versions for sidebar (sorted)

        // Determine which tab content to show based on content type
        $tabData = [];
        if ($content->type === 'sop') {
            $tabData['sopContent'] = $contentData;
        } elseif ($content->type === 'visual_diagram') {
            $tabData['visualContent'] = $contentData;
        } elseif ($content->type === 'swimlane') {
            $tabData['swimlaneContent'] = $contentData;
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/show', array_merge([
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
        ], $tabData));
    }

    /**
     * Update version status (like SOP updateStatus)
     */
    public function updateVersionStatus(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): RedirectResponse
    {
        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Start', [
            'request_data' => $request->all(),
            'process_id' => $process->id,
            'core_id' => $core->id,
            'content_id' => $content->id,
            'version_id' => $version->id,
            'current_version_status' => $version->status,
            'user_id' => Auth::id()
        ]);

        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            Log::error('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Version does not belong to content', [
                'version_content_id' => $version->content_id,
                'expected_content_id' => $content->id
            ]);
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'status' => 'required|integer|in:0,1,2',
        ]);

        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Validation passed', [
            'validated_data' => $validated
        ]);

        $newStatus = $validated['status'];

        DB::transaction(function () use ($version, $content, $newStatus) {
            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Starting transaction', [
                'version_id' => $version->id,
                'old_status' => $version->status,
                'new_status' => $newStatus
            ]);

            // Handle status constraints
            if ($newStatus === 1) { // Current
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Setting as current, updating other versions');
                // Set all other versions to draft (0)
                $affectedVersions = $content->versions()->where('id', '!=', $version->id)->update([
                    'status' => 0,
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id()
                ]);
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updated other versions to draft', [
                    'affected_count' => $affectedVersions
                ]);
            } elseif ($newStatus === 2) { // Future
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Setting as future, updating other future versions');
                // Set all other future versions to draft (0)
                $affectedVersions = $content->versions()
                    ->where('id', '!=', $version->id)
                    ->where('status', 2)
                    ->update([
                        'status' => 0,
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id()
                    ]);
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updated other future versions to draft', [
                    'affected_count' => $affectedVersions
                ]);
            }

            // Update the target version
            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updating target version', [
                'version_id' => $version->id,
                'new_status' => $newStatus
            ]);

            $updateResult = $version->update([
                'status' => $newStatus,
                'updated_by' => Auth::id()
            ]);

            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Target version updated', [
                'update_result' => $updateResult,
                'version_after_update' => $version->fresh()->toArray()
            ]);
        });

        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Transaction completed successfully');

        return back()->with('success', 'Version status updated successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Update RACI activities
     */
    public function updateActivities(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'activities' => 'required|array',
            'activities.*.id' => 'nullable|exists:business_process_activities,id',
            'activities.*.name' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.responsible' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.accountable' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.consulted' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.informed' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.position' => 'required|integer|min:1',
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
            // Get existing activity IDs
            $existingIds = collect($validated['activities'])
                ->pluck('id')
                ->filter()
                ->toArray();

            // Delete activities not in the list
            $core->activities()
                ->whereNotIn('id', $existingIds)
                ->delete();

            // Update or create activities
            foreach ($validated['activities'] as $activityData) {
                if (isset($activityData['id'])) {
                    // Update existing activity
                    $activity = $core->activities()->find($activityData['id']);
                    if ($activity) {
                        $activity->update([
                            'name' => $activityData['name'],
                            'responsible' => $activityData['responsible'],
                            'accountable' => $activityData['accountable'],
                            'consulted' => $activityData['consulted'],
                            'informed' => $activityData['informed'],
                            'position' => $activityData['position'],
                        ]);
                    }
                } else {
                    // Create new activity
                    $core->activities()->create([
                        'name' => $activityData['name'],
                        'responsible' => $activityData['responsible'],
                        'accountable' => $activityData['accountable'],
                        'consulted' => $activityData['consulted'],
                        'informed' => $activityData['informed'],
                        'position' => $activityData['position'],
                    ]);
                }
            }
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', 'Activities updated successfully.');
    }
}

1. When they load the main core page `/business-processes/1/cores/1`, the version status displays correctly
2. But when they navigate to a specific version page like `/business-processes/1/cores/1/contents/8/versions/13`, the version cards lose their formatting/status

This suggests there are two different controller methods handling these different routes:

1. `CoreProcessController@show` - handles `/business-processes/1/cores/1` (main core page)
2. `CoreProcessController@showVersion` - handles `/business-processes/1/cores/1/contents/8/versions/13` (specific version page)

<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\BusinessProcessProcess;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessCore;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessContent;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessContentVersion;
use App\Models\BusinessProcessActivity;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;
use Inertia\Inertia;
use Inertia\Response;
use Illuminate\Http\RedirectResponse;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Auth;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;
use Illuminate\Foundation\Auth\Access\AuthorizesRequests;

class CoreProcessController extends Controller
{
    use AuthorizesRequests;

    /**
     * Show the core process with tabs
     */
    public function show(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        // Load relationships
        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with(['blueprint', 'category']);
            },
            'contents.versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc');
            }
        ]);

        // Get content for each type with ALL their versions (like SOP)
        // Use fresh() to reload from database and get updated status values
        $sopContent = $core->contents()->where('type', 'sop')->first();
        if ($sopContent) {
            // Refresh the sopContent to ensure we have the latest data
            $sopContent = $sopContent->fresh(['versions.creator', 'versions.updater']);
            
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $sopContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $sopContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $sopContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                // Add the display version's content to the sopContent object
                $sopContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $sopContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $sopContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $sopContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $sopContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $sopContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $sopContent->allVersions = $allVersions; // Add sorted versions
            }
        }

        $visualContent = $core->contents()->where('type', 'visual_diagram')->first();
        if ($visualContent) {
            // Refresh the visualContent to ensure we have the latest data
            $visualContent = $visualContent->fresh(['versions.creator', 'versions.updater']);
            
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $visualContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $visualContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $visualContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                $visualContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $visualContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $visualContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $visualContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $visualContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $visualContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $visualContent->allVersions = $allVersions;
            }
        }

        $swimlaneContent = $core->contents()->where('type', 'swimlane')->first();
        if ($swimlaneContent) {
            // Refresh the swimlaneContent to ensure we have the latest data
            $swimlaneContent = $swimlaneContent->fresh(['versions.creator', 'versions.updater']);
            
            // Get sorted versions like SOP
            $allVersions = $swimlaneContent->getSortedVersions();

            // Status is already integer from database (0=draft, 1=current, 2=archived)
            // No conversion needed anymore
            $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($version) {
                // Ensure status is integer (it should already be)
                $version->status = (int)$version->status;
                return $version;
            });

            // Get current or latest version for display
            $displayVersion = $swimlaneContent->getCurrentVersion() ?? $swimlaneContent->getLatestVersion();

            if ($displayVersion) {
                // Status is already integer from database
                $displayVersion->status = (int)$displayVersion->status;

                $swimlaneContent->content = $displayVersion->content;
                $swimlaneContent->version_number = $displayVersion->version_number;
                $swimlaneContent->change_summary = $displayVersion->change_summary;
                $swimlaneContent->status = $displayVersion->status;
                $swimlaneContent->current_version = $displayVersion; // Add current version reference
                $swimlaneContent->currentVersion = $displayVersion; // Backward compatibility
                $swimlaneContent->allVersions = $allVersions;
            }
        }

        // Prepare versions arrays
        $sopVersions = $sopContent?->allVersions ?? [];
        $visualVersions = $visualContent?->allVersions ?? [];
        $swimlaneVersions = $swimlaneContent?->allVersions ?? [];

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/show', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
            'sopContent' => $sopContent,
            'sopVersions' => $sopVersions,
            'visualContent' => $visualContent,
            'visualVersions' => $visualVersions,
            'swimlaneContent' => $swimlaneContent,
            'swimlaneVersions' => $swimlaneVersions,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show SOP tab content
     */
    public function showSop(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $sopContent = $core->sopContent();

        if ($sopContent) {
            $sopContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/sop', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $sopContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show RACI tab content
     */
    public function showRaci(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with('blueprint');
            }
        ]);

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/raci', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show Visual Diagram tab content
     */
    public function showVisual(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $visualContent = $core->visualContent();

        if ($visualContent) {
            $visualContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/visual', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $visualContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Show Swimlane tab content
     */
    public function showSwimlane(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        $core->load(['process.category', 'user']);
        $swimlaneContent = $core->swimlaneContent();

        if ($swimlaneContent) {
            $swimlaneContent->load(['versions' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')->with(['creator', 'updater']);
            }]);
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/tabs/swimlane', [
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'content' => $swimlaneContent,
        ]);
    }

    /**
     * Update content for SOP, Visual, or Swimlane
     */
    public function updateContent(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, string $type): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Validate content type
        if (!in_array($type, ['sop', 'visual_diagram', 'swimlane'])) {
            abort(400, 'Invalid content type');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'content' => 'required|string',
            'change_summary' => 'nullable|string',
            'metadata' => 'nullable|array',
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $type, $validated) {
            // Get or create content record
            $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $type)->first();

            if (!$content) {
                $content = $core->contents()->create([
                    'type' => $type,
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            } else {
                $content->update([
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            }

            // Create new version
            $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
            $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                (float)$latestVersion->version_number + 0.1 :
                1.0;

            $content->versions()->create([
                'content' => $validated['content'],
                'version_number' => number_format($nextVersionNumber, 1),
                'status' => 1, // 1 = current
                'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'] ?? 'Content updated',
                'metadata' => $validated['metadata'] ?? [],
                'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);

            // Mark previous versions as archived
            $content->versions()
                ->where('version_number', '!=', number_format($nextVersionNumber, 1))
                ->update(['status' => 2]); // 2 = archived
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', ucfirst($type) . ' content updated successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Store new content (SOP, Visual, or Swimlane)
     */
    public function storeContent(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        try {
            // Log incoming request data
            Log::info('storeContent - Incoming request', [
                'all_data' => $request->all(),
                'content_length' => strlen($request->get('content', '')),
                'content_preview' => substr($request->get('content', ''), 0, 100),
            ]);

            $validated = $request->validate([
                'content_type' => 'required|string|in:sop,visual_diagram,swimlane',
                'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
                'content' => 'required|string|min:1', // Content is required and must not be empty
                'change_summary' => 'nullable|string',
                'version_label' => 'nullable|string|max:50',
                'metadata' => 'nullable|array',
                'core_id' => 'nullable|integer', // Frontend sends this but we don't need it since we have $core
            ]);

            Log::info('storeContent - Validation passed', [
                'validated_content_length' => strlen($validated['content']),
                'validated_content_preview' => substr($validated['content'], 0, 100),
            ]);

            DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
                Log::info('storeContent - Starting transaction');

                // Get or create content record using the relationship
                $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $validated['content_type'])->first();
                Log::info('storeContent - Content lookup', ['found_existing' => !!$content]);

                if (!$content) {
                    $content = $core->contents()->create([
                        'type' => $validated['content_type'],
                        'title' => $validated['title'],
                        'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                    ]);
                    Log::info('storeContent - Created new content', ['content_id' => $content->id]);
                } else {
                    $content->update([
                        'title' => $validated['title'],
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                    ]);
                    Log::info('storeContent - Updated existing content', ['content_id' => $content->id]);
                }

                // Determine next version number as string
                $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
                $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                    ((float)$latestVersion->version_number + 1.0) :
                    1.0;

                Log::info('storeContent - Creating version', [
                    'latest_version' => $latestVersion?->version_number,
                    'next_version' => $nextVersionNumber
                ]);

                $newVersion = $content->versions()->create([
                    'content' => $validated['content'] ?? '', // Handle null content
                    'version_number' => (string)$nextVersionNumber,
                    'status' => 'draft', // Use string status
                    'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'] ?? 'New content created',
                    'metadata' => $validated['metadata'] ?? [],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);

                Log::info('storeContent - Created version successfully', ['version_id' => $newVersion->id]);
                Log::info('storeContent - Transaction completed successfully');
            });

            return redirect()->back()->with('success', ucfirst($validated['content_type']) . ' content created successfully.');
        } catch (\Illuminate\Validation\ValidationException $e) {
            Log::error('Validation failed in storeContent', ['errors' => $e->errors(), 'request' => $request->all()]);
            return redirect()->back()->withErrors($e->errors())->withInput();
        } catch (\Exception $e) {
            Log::error('Error in storeContent', ['error' => $e->getMessage(), 'request' => $request->all()]);
            return redirect()->back()->with('error', 'Failed to save content: ' . $e->getMessage());
        }
    }

    /**
     * Save changes to a specific version (like SOP saveVersion)
     */
    public function saveVersion(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'content' => 'sometimes|required|string',
            'title' => 'sometimes|string|max:255',
        ]);

        Log::info('saveVersion - Updating existing version', [
            'content_id' => $content->id,
            'version_id' => $version->id,
            'content_length' => strlen($validated['content'] ?? ''),
        ]);

        // Update the specific version (working copy)
        $updateData = [
            'content' => $validated['content'] ?? $version->content,
            'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
        ];

        $version->update($updateData);

        // Update content metadata if title provided
        if (isset($validated['title'])) {
            $content->update([
                'title' => $validated['title'],
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);
        }

        return back()->with('success', 'Version saved successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Commit the current working copy as a new version (like SOP commit)
     */
    public function commit(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'content_type' => 'required|string|in:sop,visual_diagram,swimlane',
            'content' => 'required|string',
            'title' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'change_summary' => 'required|string',
        ]);

        Log::info('commit - Creating new version', [
            'core_id' => $core->id,
            'content_type' => $validated['content_type'],
            'content_length' => strlen($validated['content']),
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
            // Get or create content record
            $content = $core->contents()->where('type', $validated['content_type'])->first();

            if (!$content) {
                $content = $core->contents()->create([
                    'type' => $validated['content_type'],
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            } else {
                $content->update([
                    'title' => $validated['title'],
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
                ]);
            }

            // Get next version number
            $latestVersion = $content->versions()->orderBy('version_number', 'desc')->first();
            $nextVersionNumber = $latestVersion ?
                ((float)$latestVersion->version_number + 1.0) :
                1.0;

            // Create new version
            $content->versions()->create([
                'content' => $validated['content'],
                'version_number' => (string)$nextVersionNumber,
                'status' => 0, // New versions start as draft (0 = draft, 1 = current, 2 = future)
                'change_summary' => $validated['change_summary'],
                'metadata' => [],
                'created_by' => Auth::id(),
                'updated_by' => Auth::id(),
            ]);

            Log::info('commit - New version created successfully', [
                'content_id' => $content->id,
                'version_number' => $nextVersionNumber,
            ]);
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', 'New version created successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Show a specific version of content (like SOP showVersion)
     */
    public function showVersion(BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): Response
    {
        $this->authorize('view', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        // Load relationships
        $core->load([
            'process.category',
            'user',
            'activities' => function ($query) {
                $query->orderBy('position')->with('blueprint');
            }
        ]);

        $version->load(['creator']);

        // Get sorted versions like SOP
        $allVersions = $content->getSortedVersions();

        // Convert string statuses to integers for frontend compatibility
        $allVersions = $allVersions->map(function ($v) {
            $statusMap = ['draft' => 0, 'current' => 1, 'archived' => 2];
            $v->status = $statusMap[$v->status] ?? 0;
            return $v;
        });

        // Convert version status to integer
        $statusMap = ['draft' => 0, 'current' => 1, 'archived' => 2];
        $version->status = $statusMap[$version->status] ?? 0;

        // Prepare content data with specific version
        $contentData = $content->toArray();
        $contentData['content'] = $version->content;
        $contentData['version_number'] = $version->version_number;
        $contentData['change_summary'] = $version->change_summary;
        $contentData['status'] = $version->status;
        $contentData['currentVersion'] = $version; // Current viewing version
        $contentData['allVersions'] = $allVersions; // All versions for sidebar (sorted)

        // Determine which tab content to show based on content type
        $tabData = [];
        if ($content->type === 'sop') {
            $tabData['sopContent'] = $contentData;
        } elseif ($content->type === 'visual_diagram') {
            $tabData['visualContent'] = $contentData;
        } elseif ($content->type === 'swimlane') {
            $tabData['swimlaneContent'] = $contentData;
        }

        return Inertia::render('business-processes/cores/show', array_merge([
            'process' => $process,
            'core' => $core,
            'activities' => $core->activities,
        ], $tabData));
    }

    /**
     * Update version status (like SOP updateStatus)
     */
    public function updateVersionStatus(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core, BusinessProcessContent $content, BusinessProcessContentVersion $version): RedirectResponse
    {
        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Start', [
            'request_data' => $request->all(),
            'process_id' => $process->id,
            'core_id' => $core->id,
            'content_id' => $content->id,
            'version_id' => $version->id,
            'current_version_status' => $version->status,
            'user_id' => Auth::id()
        ]);

        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        // Verify version belongs to this content
        if ($version->content_id !== $content->id) {
            Log::error('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Version does not belong to content', [
                'version_content_id' => $version->content_id,
                'expected_content_id' => $content->id
            ]);
            abort(404, 'Version not found for this content');
        }

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'status' => 'required|integer|in:0,1,2',
        ]);

        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Validation passed', [
            'validated_data' => $validated
        ]);

        $newStatus = $validated['status'];

        DB::transaction(function () use ($version, $content, $newStatus) {
            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Starting transaction', [
                'version_id' => $version->id,
                'old_status' => $version->status,
                'new_status' => $newStatus
            ]);

            // Handle status constraints
            if ($newStatus === 1) { // Current
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Setting as current, updating other versions');
                // Set all other versions to draft (0)
                $affectedVersions = $content->versions()->where('id', '!=', $version->id)->update([
                    'status' => 0,
                    'updated_by' => Auth::id()
                ]);
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updated other versions to draft', [
                    'affected_count' => $affectedVersions
                ]);
            } elseif ($newStatus === 2) { // Future
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Setting as future, updating other future versions');
                // Set all other future versions to draft (0)
                $affectedVersions = $content->versions()
                    ->where('id', '!=', $version->id)
                    ->where('status', 2)
                    ->update([
                        'status' => 0,
                        'updated_by' => Auth::id()
                    ]);
                Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updated other future versions to draft', [
                    'affected_count' => $affectedVersions
                ]);
            }

            // Update the target version
            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Updating target version', [
                'version_id' => $version->id,
                'new_status' => $newStatus
            ]);

            $updateResult = $version->update([
                'status' => $newStatus,
                'updated_by' => Auth::id()
            ]);

            Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Target version updated', [
                'update_result' => $updateResult,
                'version_after_update' => $version->fresh()->toArray()
            ]);
        });

        Log::info('CoreProcessController::updateVersionStatus - Transaction completed successfully');

        return back()->with('success', 'Version status updated successfully.');
    }

    /**
     * Update RACI activities
     */
    public function updateActivities(Request $request, BusinessProcessProcess $process, BusinessProcessCore $core): RedirectResponse
    {
        $this->authorize('update', $core);

        $validated = $request->validate([
            'activities' => 'required|array',
            'activities.*.id' => 'nullable|exists:business_process_activities,id',
            'activities.*.name' => 'required|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.responsible' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.accountable' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.consulted' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.informed' => 'nullable|string|max:255',
            'activities.*.position' => 'required|integer|min:1',
        ]);

        DB::transaction(function () use ($core, $validated) {
            // Get existing activity IDs
            $existingIds = collect($validated['activities'])
                ->pluck('id')
                ->filter()
                ->toArray();

            // Delete activities not in the list
            $core->activities()
                ->whereNotIn('id', $existingIds)
                ->delete();

            // Update or create activities
            foreach ($validated['activities'] as $activityData) {
                if (isset($activityData['id'])) {
                    // Update existing activity
                    $activity = $core->activities()->find($activityData['id']);
                    if ($activity) {
                        $activity->update([
                            'name' => $activityData['name'],
                            'responsible' => $activityData['responsible'],
                            'accountable' => $activityData['accountable'],
                            'consulted' => $activityData['consulted'],
                            'informed' => $activityData['informed'],
                            'position' => $activityData['position'],
                        ]);
                    }
                } else {
                    // Create new activity
                    $core->activities()->create([
                        'name' => $activityData['name'],
                        'responsible' => $activityData['responsible'],
                        'accountable' => $activityData['accountable'],
                        'consulted' => $activityData['consulted'],
                        'informed' => $activityData['informed'],
                        'position' => $activityData['position'],
                    ]);
                }
            }
        });

        return redirect()->back()->with('success', 'Activities updated successfully.');
    }
}
